cubrid_version -- Is used to get the CUBRID PHP module’s version

  string cubrid_version()~

The |cubrid_version| function is used to get the CUBRID PHP module’s
version.

This function has no parameters.

Version information (eg. "1.2.0").

|cubrid_version| example

<?php >
  echo cubrid_version();
?>



|cubrid_error_code| |cubrid_error_code_facility|

vim:ft=help:
